strings.STR_L_HTML5: This game uses HTML5. If it loads but does not run, please update your web browser.
strings.STR_TITLE_DISNEY_CHANNEL: Watch Mickey Mouse & Friends on Disney Channel
strings.STR_LEVEL_1_DESCRIPTION:
Wakey wakey!

The sun is rising and so is the temperature.

Get ready to serve some hot-headed customers.
strings.STR_LEVEL_2_DESCRIPTION:
Hot in the city!

The lunchtime crowds need their thirst quenching and Donald's going quackers!
strings.STR_LEVEL_3_DESCRIPTION:
It's the Rush Hour Rampage!

Serve the hot and bothered commuters their home-time hydration.
strings.STR_LEADERBOARD_MADE_IT: You made it onto the leaderboard! Click here to enter your name
strings.STR_LEADERBOARD_SUBMIT: Click here to submit your score
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_1: Guide Donald by using the arrow keys to move.
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_1_mobile:
Guide Donald by tapping 
 on the left and right of the screen
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_2.0: Watch out for ferocious sea creatures
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_2.5: Jump over the sea creatures by pressing Up
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_2.5_mobile:
Jump over the sea creatures by tapping on 
 the left and right of the screen at the same time.
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_3:
If a creature catches Donald, they'll start a kerfuffle! 
 Keep pressing the arrow keys to escape!
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_3_mobile:
If a creature catches Donald, they'll start a kerfuffle! 
 Keep tapping to get away!
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_4:
Keep an eye on Donald's air supply. 
 When it runs out, he will flip out and go into Frenzy Mode!
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_5:
In Frenzy Mode, you can smash 
 platforms and fish for even more points!
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_6:
Open up the treasure chest to 
 unlock hidden levels!
strings.STR_GAME_HELP_7:
Buy better suits to get more air, 
 dive deeper and finish harder levels
